title: Risk Assets Fail to Recover From Greenland Tensions, Japan Shock
description: Developing-world assets fell across the board on Tuesday as a crash in Japanese bonds and growing fears over President Donald Trump’s Greenland threats weighed on global markets.
content: Developing-world assets fell across the board on Tuesday as a crash in Japanese bonds and growing fears over President Donald Trump’s Greenland threats weighed on global markets.
